sources.name: People experiencing homelessness in the USA (PIT), by shelter status - HUD 2016.
sources.description:
Data published by The U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD Exchange)
Data publisher's source The Annual Homeless Assessment Report (AHAR), HUD report to the U.S. Congress, November 2016
Link https://www.hudexchange.info/resource/3031/pit-and-hic-data-since-2007/
Retrieved 2017-02-20

Additional information

HUD's description of the report:

"This report outlines the key findings of the 2016 Point-In-Time (PIT) count and Housing Inventory Count (HIC) conducted in January 2016. Specifically, this report provides 2016 national, state, and CoC-level PIT and HIC estimates of homelessness, as well as estimates of chronically homeless persons, homeless veterans, and homeless children and youth".

All HUD reports are available here.
